page.title: 05PLAYGROUP
page.content: Childern start{playgroup}in the term before they are 3.Their toys are mainly ride on toys like bikes and tractors.They have 27 children on the register. First they go for 1 morning, then for 2, and in the last 2 terms they go for 3 mornings they paint, draw and make models. They have an hour every day for free play then they put the toys away and have milk and biscuits and then sing songs.Then they put their coats on and wait on the stage for their mums and dads. Darren is 3 and his favourite toy is the{bus.}Sam is 2 and he is starting{playgroup}in September but he comes so he get used to it, he enjoys painting.The{playgroup}goes on an outing once every year and they have a Christmas party. Mrs{E.Ray}is the leader.
